      • priority

        public int priority()
        Description copied from class: BeanProperty
        Used to give priority to implementations, for example by default a method would have a higher priority than a field because it can do some logic. The greater the priority value is the more important is this BeanProperty.
        Returns:
        the priority of this BeanProperty
